titles.title: We're Singing A New Song Of Glorious Triumph

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're singing a new song of glorious triumph.
For we see the government of God in our lives. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He is crowned, God of the whole world crowned,
King of creation, crowned; ruling the nations now. (Repeat.)
